attributes.additional_details: Knife crime in the uk is increasing. The youths think it’s ok to carry them without punishment. Handing down harsher punishment/punishment will help reduce this.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions, which call for similar actions: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/635897
Impose minimum sentences for first offence of possession of a knife

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/633328
Introduce tougher sentences for knife crime

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636853
Mandatory 10-year sentence for possession of a knife
